desc: Sidebar navigation, top bar with device selector, status, and command palette entry.
acceptance: Device selector visible on all screens.
Sidebar includes core modules only.
No-device state disables device-specific modules.

desc: First-run guidance for ADB, device connection, and next steps.
acceptance: Shows ADB missing instructions when required.
Connect device checklist present on home.
Actionable error guidance for unauthorized devices.

desc: Pairing flow for QR or pairing code with clear status feedback.
acceptance: Pairing entry point available from empty state and top bar.
Shows pairing progress and success/failure states.
Paired device becomes selectable immediately.

desc: Grid of most common actions + recent packages/log filters.
acceptance: At least 6 quick actions available.
Recent packages list is visible and actionable.

desc: Categorized action list with advanced toggle and input validation.
acceptance: Advanced actions hidden by default.
Inputs validated before execution.

desc: Virtualized list, filters, pause/resume, and keyboard shortcuts.
acceptance: Log list remains responsive under heavy output.
Filters by level and tag.
Pause/Resume accessible by keyboard.

desc: Two-pane file browser with push/pull and context menu.
acceptance: Push/pull supports drag & drop and toolbar buttons.
Breadcrumbs and current path visible.

desc: Screenshot canvas + node tree + properties panel.
acceptance: Hover/selection sync between canvas and tree.
Export XML and refresh controls present.

desc: Optional live mirror mode (scrcpy or equivalent) with a safe fallback to static capture.
acceptance: Live mirror can be toggled on/off.
Static capture remains available if mirror fails.
Clear error messaging if mirror dependencies are missing.

desc: Searchable package list with common actions.
acceptance: Search and filter work instantly.
Launch, clear data, uninstall are accessible.
Open palette from any screen.
Supports device switch and common actions.

desc: Light/dark toggle, font scaling, and shortcut reference.
acceptance: Theme toggle persists.
Keyboard shortcuts are listed and searchable.
